name: Trident Rebuildable Atomizer
description: The Trident by Grand Vapor has a 510 connect, copper contacts, adjustable airflow. This is a quality, stainless steel drip atomizer that can support both a single and dual coil build. The posts are grooved and have a threaded lock cap, rather than eyelets and screws.

name: IGO-W Rebuildable Atomizer
description:
Dripping Atomizer
Sealed battery connector
2 Airholes located on outer casing (see images)
510 Threaded
Two philips head screws for positive/negative post
Extra post for Single or Dual Coil configuration
Rebuild using fiberglass or silica rope and wire
Stainless steel body and base
Fits most 510 drip tips
Wick and wire sold separately

name: AGI Genesis Rebuildable Atomizer
description:
The AGI is one of the most versatile rebuildable atomizers to date.  The AGI can be used as a genesis style atomizer, a dripping atomier, or silica tank atomizer just by changing the setup.

The AGI has a new top cap that is capable of being adjusted to position the air hole for maximum vapor, or throat hit.

Rebuildable using either Stainless Steel mesh, or Silica Rope.

The stainless steel body with chrome finish is highly durable, looks very attractive on a variety of units.  With its 510 thread connection, and sealed connector it can be used on a vast array of 510 threaded units. 

The tank is made of Pyrex  and holds roughly 3ml of liquid. 

The AGI has a built in protective hot spring to prevent any damage from a short circuit.  " This is not a fail safe safety feature.  Still use caution when building and using this atomizer. "



The AGI comes with the following :

     1 x AGI MultiPurpose Atomizer
     4 x Spare o-rings
     1 x Wire
     1 x Mesh
     1 x Silica Rope
     1 x Spare Nut
     1 x Safety Hot Spring
     1 x Spare Screw
     1 x Allen Key

The rebuildable & genesis style atomizer is only for advanced users who can roll their own mesh wicks, and coils.  If you are not comfortable with this, and or using a meter to ensure a proper coil we do not suggest purchasing this atomizer.  

We will not be responsible for any damage to any equipment etc... from the use of this atomizer.  Please use caution when building or using this product. 

Due to the nature of this product we will only warranty it against manufacturer defect.  Any damage from cross threading, thread damage, oring damage, and normal wear an tear is not covered.

name: VapeOnly BCC Mega Tank (Black)
description:
3.5ml Vapeonly BCC (Bottom Coil Changeable) Mega Clear Tank System.

Transparent tank to see liquid level.  Vapeonly is a new division of a major e-cigarette company.  This tank looks like it was made especially for the eVic and looks amazing on it (hint, hint)

It's filled in just the same way as the T3, by turning the tank upside down, unscrew the bottom cap, add 1-3.5ml of e-liquid (straight from the bottle) and replacing the cap.

3.5ml Vapeonly BCC Kit comes with 3 coil units with 1.8ohm, 2.2ohm and 2.5 ohm, which can fit on most batteries with 510/eGo threading from 3.2v to 6v. So you can choose the one that produces the best experience for you. This produces tons of vapor making for a great vaping experience.

These models come with BLACK metal base and top caps.

Package includes:
Transparent tank tube
Top Cap
Base
1.8Ω coil head
2.2Ω coil head
2.5Ω coil head
Flat tip mouthpiece (510 drip tip size)

name: MFLUX Drip Tip
description: Stainless Steel driptip with a wide mouth for airflow that helps create massive clouds! Available in various colors & will fit 510 atomizers.

name: Envision Glass Drip Tip
description:
Hand-blown pyrex glass drip tips with a flare! Available in different colors and shapes for even the most unique vapers.

*all tips are handmade and therefore vary in size and symmetry

description:

Pyrex glass tank 
Holds 5.0 ML's of e-liquid 
Compatible with XXL size cartomizers 
Set comes with the tank and matching tip

description:

Compatible with standard size cartomizers

name: Fuel Tank
description: Standard size cartomizer tank designed with pyrex glass & aluminum caps. Great for flavor & will not crack against mentholated or citrus e-liquid flavors.

name: DCT Tank Kit
description: XXL cartomizer kit designed in different colored plastic tank variations. Comes with silver drip tip and cartomizer. Has a 510 connection, meant for various devices such as ego, provari, zmax, etc.

name: Kanger Protank II
description:
The Kanger ProTank II offers the same great features and performance as the Kanger ProTank but now has removable parts and a removable drip tip.
The Protank II is 510 threaded and will work on all 510 threaded devices and Mod's without the need for an adapter.

Features:
Replaceable Atomizer Heads (can be used with eVod coils or vice versa see note below)
Bottom Coil for better performance from your eliquid
Removable and replacable Pyrex Glass Tank for protection from harsh liquids 
Capacity is 2.5ml but it can hold up to 3ml if you fill it at less of an angle.
Comes with 2.5ohms coils, Replacement coils in 2.5, 2.2ohms and 1.8ohms are available here
Uses the same coils and base as the original ProTank

name: Kanger Protank II Mini
description:
The Mini Kanger Protank 2 is a glue-free and fully disassemble-able Ego Clearomizer!  

The Kanger Protank 2 offers the same great features and performance as the Kanger Clearomizers but with the introduction of a glass tank! The mouthpiece is permanently attached.

Updated in Mini Kanger Protank 2:
Pyrex tank is replaceable
Glue Free: All parts are replaceable
Features:
Replaceable Atomizer Heads (interchangeable with Protank 1 and EVOD)
Bottom Coil
Pyrex Glass Tank
Advertised with a 1.5ml capacity
Dimensions: 3"L x 9/16"D

name: Innokin iClear30 Tank
description:
Innokin iClear 30 Dual Coil Tank Clearomizer
3 ml Capacity
Dimensions: 3"L x  3/4"D

The iClear 30 features dual coils, an easily replaceable atomizer head, a large 3ML capacity, and rotatable threaded mouth piece. 

Replaceable Dual Coil Innokin iClear 30 is the first dual coil clearomizer with a replaceable atomizer head, making it very inexpensive to maintain, while providing huge amounts of vapor and flavor. 

The huge capacity is another great feature of the iClear 30. It has a large 3ml chamber for holding eLiquid. Vape longer in between fills!

Rotatable Mouth Piece: The iClear 30 utilizes a rotatable mouth piece with an innovative 360 degree rotating design. These mouth pieces are designed to swivel around, providing a more comfortable and enjoyable vape! Unfortunately, this mouthpiece is threaded and cannot be replaced with a drip tip.

To replace atomizer head: Unscrew the base (that's the battery end) from the tank, unscrew the atomizer head (the part with the rope wicks) from the base, screw on a new atomizer to the base and screw the base back onto the tank. All parts are easily removed for cleaning or replacement.

Easy to fill with a standard dropper top bottle: Unscrew the mouthpiece, tilt and fill along the sides of the tank (avoid getting eLiquid in to the air-hole in the center).  

510 Threaded: Compatible with Ego Series batteries, MVari, the BOLT, ZMAX, Vamo, etc.
For best results, we recommend using the iClear with a variable voltage device at 4.4V - 5.0V.

name: Cartomizer (Standard Resistance)
description: Atomizer cartridges with a 510 connect with a punched hole to allow for a tank to be attached along the outside. The atomizers are standard-res, meaning the ohms will vary from 2.7-3.0. Available in two sizes: standard & xxl. Comes in a box of 5.

name: Efect IMR Battery
description:
Efest IMR 18350 800mAh Flat Top 3.7V Rechargeable LiMn Battery 
Sold Individually
Dimensions: 35mm (L) x 18mm (D)


Safe chemistry LiMN means reduced risk of venting with flame or explosion. Due to the safety inherent in IMR safe chemistry batteries there is no protection circuitry added or built in. This provides a slightly shorter battery length to enable a good fit in most mods. 

To ensure longevity, it is not recommended to allow the battery to discharge below 2.5V. 

Please note that due to their inherent safety, IMR cells don't have a protection circuit built in. They should never be discharged below 2.5 volts or cycle life/performance will be reduced. Maximum charge voltage is 4.25 volts.

name: Trustfire Battery Charger
description: Trustfire TR-001 Dual channel Li-Ion Battery charger. Has two independent charging channels for Li-Ion batteries with a seperate LED for status for each channel. Red = Charging, Green = Charged. 4.2 volt, 500ma output charges batteries quickly. Works with most any cylindrical Li-Ion 3.7 volt batteries: 18650, 18500, 18350,17670, 16340, 14650, 14500, 14430, 10440. Comes with 3 foot power cord.

name: Nitecore i2 Intellicharger
description:
The Intellicharger i2 is a universal, automatic smart-charger compatible with almost all types of rechargeable batteries thus eliminating the need to own several chargers. The i2 is able to automatically identify Li-ion, Ni-MH and Ni-Cd rechargeable batteries and apply an appropriate charging mode (Constant Charge Current (CC), Constant Charge Voltage (CV) and Trickle Charge). Each of the i2’s two micro processor-controlled
charging slots is capable of monitoring and charging batteries independently. Additionally, yellow and blue power/charging status indicator lights could visibly indicate battery status and charging process. i2: The all-new highly advanced smart charger. It’s as simple as insert, detect, and charge.

Features:
· Capable of charging 2 batteries simultaneously
· Each of the two battery slots monitors and charges independently
· Automatically identifies Li-ion, Ni-MH and Ni-Cd rechargeable batteries
· Features three charging modes (CC, CV and Trickle Charge)
· Automatically detects battery status and selects the appropriate voltage and charge mode
· 3 LED displays charging progress for each battery
· Automatically stops charging when complete
· Features reverse polarity protection
· Designed for optimal heat dissipation
· Certified by both RoHS and CE

Specifications:
Input voltage: AC 100-240V 50/60Hz or DC 12V
Input power: 10W
Output voltage: 4.2V ±1% / 1.48V ±1%
Output current: 0.5A × 2
Dimensions: 132mm × 70mm × 35mm
Weight: 104g (without batteries and power cord)
Compatible with:
Li-ion: 26650, 22650, 18650, 17670, 18490, 17500, 17335, 16340(RCR123), 14500
Ni-MH / Ni-Cd: AA, AAA, C

name: Nitecore i4 Intellicharger
description:
The Intellicharger i4 is a universal, automatic smart-charger compatible with almost all types of rechargeable batteries thus eliminating the need to own several chargers. The i4 is able to automatically identify Li-ion, Ni-MH and Ni-Cd rechargeable batteries and apply an appropriate charging mode (Constant Charge Current (CC), Constant Charge Voltage (CV) and Trickle Charge). Each of the i4’s four microcomputer-controlled charging slots is capable of monitoring and charging batteries independently. Additionally, yellow and blue power/charging status indicator lights could visibly indicate battery status and charging process. i4: The all-new highly advanced smart charger. It’s as simple as insert, detect, and charge.

Features:
· Capable of charging 4 batteries simultaneously
· Each of the four battery slots monitors and charges independently
· Automatically identifies Li-ion, Ni-MH and Ni-Cd rechargeable batteries
· Features three charging modes (CC, CV and Trickle Charge)
· Automatically detects battery status and selects the appropriate voltage and charge mode
· 3 Color LED displays charging progress for each battery
· Automatically stops charging when complete
· Features reverse polarity protection
· Designed for optimal heat dissipation
· Certified by both RoHS and CE

Specifications:
Input voltage: AC 100~240V 50/60HZ or DC 12V
Input power: 10W
Output voltage: 4.2V ±1% / 1.48V ±1%
Output current: 375mA × 4 / 750mA × 2
Dimensions: 139mm × 96mm × 36mm
Weight: 156g (without batteries and power cord)
Compatible with:
Li-ion: 26650, 22650, 18650, 17670, 18490, 17500, 17335, 16340(RCR123), 14500, 10440
Ni-MH / Ni-Cd: AA, AAA, C

name: Ego USB Charger
description: Designed to charge any Ego style battery with a 510 connection. Plugs directly into any USB charging port such as wall adapters, video game consoles, computers & even car adapters.

name: Ego Carrying Case
description: Hard shell case designed to carry various vaping materials such as ego batteries, juice, chargers, etc. Multifunctional pouches and is easy to bring along with you!

name: JoyeTech Ego C-Twist 1100mAh
description:
The Joye eGo-C Twist Variable Voltage 650mAh Battery 
"It's compact, portable, high capacity, durable and variable voltage!"
Dimensions: Diameter: 0.55" Length: 3.85"

It doesn't get any better than this! Imagine a JoyeTech-quality battery with variable voltage features. Vape at your desired voltage! Higher voltage = More vapor! The eGo-C Twist battery is compact making it the most portable variable voltage device available. Don't forget the high capacity battery cell... Vape for hours on a single charge!* 

The eGo-C Twist has a dial located at the base of the battery. This dial allows you to set the voltage output of the battery from 3.2V~4.8V in increments of 0.2V. Simply turn the dial to your desired vaping voltage. It features an easy to read numbered dial.



*Please Note: Results may vary. Using the battery at a higher voltage output will drain the battery quicker than when using it at a lower voltage. Standard Joye eGo series batteries output a regulated voltage of approximately 3.2v. 

Tech Specs:

510 Threaded:  Compatible with all of our Joye eGo Series atomizers and cartomizers, Joye 510 Series atomizers and cartomizers. Charge this battery using a Joye eGo Rapid USB Charger.

Variable Voltage Output: Voltage can be adjusted from 3.2V~4.8V

Short Circuit Protection: When a short is detected, the battery will shutdown until the short is removed.

Lockable: Press the button 5 times within 1.5 seconds to lock or unlock the battery. The battery LED will blink when switching modes. When the battery is in lock mode, the button is disabled and the battery will not power an atomizer or cartomizer.

Atomizer Protection/Cutoff Timer: If the button is depressed for 10 seconds, the battery will shutoff until the button is released.

Battery Monitoring/Over-Discharge Protection: The device will monitor the battery voltage and automatically turn off when the battery is discharged, preventing damage to the battery by overly depleting it. The LED will blink 5 times indicating that a charge is need.

name: Innokin iTaste VV V3
description:
Smart, stylish, innovative and packed with features, the Innokin iTaste V3 Express Kit represents a whole new approach to vaping! The unique and elegant square design is manufactured to the highest standards by Innokin and has received great reviews since it's launch. The iTaste V3 Express Kit features a standard 510 connection w/eGo threads making it compatible with just about any tank/cartomizer with a 510 or eGo connection thus offering truly versatile performance!

This superb device is much more than just a battery and comes packed with useful features. It has a powerful 800 mAh polymer li-ion pass through battery design with the voltage adjustable at the press of a button in one volt increments from 3.3-5v, with the voltage displayed on a high quality mirror finish LCD display. Not only that, but the iTaste can measure and detect the resistance of just about any cartomizer and will suggest the optimum voltage range that should be used for best results and display the relevant information on the LCD screen - take the guesswork out of variable voltage vaping and find the sweet spot for any device with ease!

The new power feature introduced with the V3 is variable wattage mode.  This is the first device of this compact size to offer variable wattage from 6-11 watts in .5 increments.  Once you set your desired wattage level, no matter what resistance atomizer you attach, the iTase V3 will adjust the output automatically.

And the features don't stop there, it also is equipped with a puff counter to monitor intake and measure the performance of the battery or your chosen cartomizer, a colour changing power button that indicates the remaining battery life, short circuit protection with 10 second cut off to prevent accidental discharge, 3 click on/off deactivation and pass through charging technology that allows you to charge the unit while vaping. Everything you need to enjoy your favourite flavour in your preferred tank/cartomizer and obtain optimum performance! 

The iTaste V3 VV Express Kit includes 1 x 800 mAh VV li-ion battery and a retractable USB charger. eLiquid and tanks/clearomizers must be purchased separately.

Available in 4 color choices:
Black (Smooth matte finish)
Chameleon (Black with metallic specks that change from purple to green in the light)
Pearl Chrome (Matte silver)
White (Smooth finish)

name: Innokin iTaste MVP
description:
INNOKIN iTaste MVP 5-in-1 Voltage Adjustable Rechargeable 2600mAh Mechanical LCD Electronic Cigarettes Set

Details:
-Designed with detachable atomizer
-Micro USB socket for charge iTaste MVP
-USB 2.0 output socket, as a mobile power supply for external devices
-The LED lights will show green, yellow or red to indicate whether there is full battery life, half capacity or charging needed
-Voltage can be adjusted from 3.3-5.0 volts
-The three most popular power connectors for iphone/iPods, mini USB (Motorola/Blacberry), a Micro USB(Motorola/Nokia/LG/Samsung)
-Suitable for 510, RN4081, 901, 8105, Tidy etc, atomizer

name: Volcano LavaTube VV
description:
Lavatube 2200mah with LCD voltage display

Lava tube Specifications:
Lava tube battery capacity 2200mAh
Lava tube output voltage 3.0V to 6.0V
Charging time 3-5hrs

Advantages:
1. Variable voltage: adjusting the voltage from 3V to 6V by hand,
higher voltage, bigger vapor.

2. LCD display: voltage, power and resistance display

3. Short circuit self-protection. When atomizer resistance is below
1.3ohm, or incorrect usage(such as reverse battery) leading to short
circuit, the device will turn off itself.

name: Sigelei Zmax Telescopic Kit
description:
The Sigelei ZMAX is an advanced personal vaporizer (APV) that features variable voltage and variable wattage adjustment. Whether you prefer to customize your vape every time or set it and forget it, the ZMAX is the device for you. 

This ZMAX features RMS operation for voltage regulation resulting in an accurate and consistent experience. The Sigelei features a beautiful OLED display. OLED technology allows the ZMAX to display full descriptions of each setting and error message taking the guesswork out of using the APV. Not only is this device feature a beautiful display and streamlined body with only 1 button, it is durable as well. The Sigelei ZMAX is constructed from stainless steel making this one solid APV.

The ZMAX also features dual mode battery operation.  For long battery life, use a single 18650 IMR battery.  For high amperage performance situations like dual coil cartomizers, use two 18350 IMR batteries.

The oversized 16mm drip well and eGo-style connector make the Sigelei ZMAX compatible with more cartomizers that many other large APVs.  This flexibility means the device will stick with you no matter how many different types of hardware you experiment with.

Specifications:

* Voltage Range - 3.0-6.0v in .1v increments
* Wattage Range - 3.0 - 15.0w in .5w increments
* Battery - single 18650 or dual 18350
* Threading - eGo/510
* Construction - stainless steel
* Protection - Battery over/under current, short circuit, vented end cap
* 16mm drip well

name: JoyeTech Evic
description:
The eVic is a revolutionary new device that can be updated through firmware. Instead of purchasing new releases of the device, simply download and install the latest firmware update for new features and performance upgrades! 

The eVic is 510 threaded and compatible with most of the 510 threaded atomizers and cartomizers we offer.

name: Chi You (Clone)
description:
Even We can't believe how good this item is, and for the price you pay this is just simply amazing. Buy it if you don't feel how we feel return the item for 100% price back. The mod that every one wants has just been clone by ehpro. Now its your chance to get this mod for 1/4 of the cost, with the same function and power. This is the closest item to the real thing, but dont need to spent $400.

Features
- Full mechanical vape mod
- Full detachable, all mechanical switch
- No wire solder , no welding
- Pure stainless steel / brass body , high quality
- Fits 18350 , 18500 and 18650 battery (with extra tube)

name: Nemesis Vapor Wall Edition (Clone) by HCigar
description:
Details:
Laser etched pattern
No circuit board, full mechanical mod
Stainless steel body
510 telescopic pin (silver-plated brass)
Bottom lockable firing button
SS air control ring
Silver plated contacts
Outer diameter: 22mm
Recessed 510 threading connector
Compatible with any device with 510 threaded connector
Can be powered by 1*18350 battery/1*18500 battery/1*18650 battery (batteries sold separately)

name: Warhead Productions Missile Mod
description:
Available in a variety of hand-painted camo prints, the Missile line are another telescopic mod contender from the Philippines. It’s constructed of aluminum and has copper contacts for the firing pins. Fits 18mm series batteries (18350, 18490/18500, 18650).

Item does not include batteries or chargers. Sold Seperately.

name: Warhead Productions Magnum Mod
description:
Available in a variety of colors, the Magnum line are another telescopic mod contender from the Philippines. It’s constructed of aluminum and has copper contacts for the firing pins. Fits 18mm series batteries (18350, 18490/18500, 18650).

Item does not include batteries or chargers. Sold Seperately.

name: Edz Avenger Mod
description: The Avenger is an excellent mod that offers a semi-telescopic body with the addition or subtraction of a sleeve to fit 18350, 18490 or 18500 battery.  It uses copper as its firing and connector pin for great conductivity.  Each Avenger mod comes with its own serial number.

name: Madz Modz NZonic V1
description:
N-Zonic Final design 3D Solid Rendering. beside the unit itself, I will include a 18650+ Extensive Sleeve. The current design can handle under the folowwing set up.

1. 18350 Configuration
2. 18350 + Kick Configuration
3. 18490/18500 Configuration

With 18650+ Extension Sleeve
4. 18650 Configuration
5. 18650 + Kick Configuration

FEATURE:

1. Sun Juice Well
2. Top Side 1 Gas Vent Hole.
3. Bottom Side 3 Gas Vent Hole
4. Magnetic Firing Switch
5. Mechanical Locking Mechanism.
6. Chameleon Telescope
7. Pin Stripe for Gripping
8. Accommodate 4 type 18XXX Series Battery
9. Swarovski Blue Crystal
10. Floating Positive Center Pin (0.5 mm Clearance)
11. 99.99% Copper Positive Center Pin
12. 99.99% Copper Negative Contact
13. 18650+ Extension Sleeve for 18650 or 18650 + Kick.
14. Native 510 Connection 
15. SUS 304 Medical / Food Grade Stainless Steel.
16. Delrin Insulator inside Topcap and Negative Contact.

name: Titan Mod by VapeHead Origins
description:
Smart Switch (Easy Twist Locking Mechanism)
T6 Red Edition Aluminium Body
Brass topcap and firing button
Telescopic (Accommodates 18650 – 18350 batteries)
Nickel Plated Copper pins
Self - Adjusting pin
Customized 510 connector
High Temperature Engineering Plastic Insulator
0.00-0.01 Voltage Drop from Battery to Mod Body

name: Atom Mod
description:
Atom APV Mod 
New Super Slick PV Mod. Mod Is Stainless Steel and Rips! Nice Engraving and Each Device Has Its Own Serial Number.
Stainless Steel Construction
Brass Contacts
Bottom Lock Feature
Bottom Push Fire Button
Telescopic Modes 18350, 18500, 18650
Compact Mod In 18350 Mode

name: Private V2 by Grand Vapor
description:
The Private V2 by Grand Vapor is one sexy mod!

It is the first tri-tone mechanical mod, featuring a fusion of stainless steel, copper and brass. This sleek body style is not only elegant, but also minimize voltage drop!

Features:
Telescopic (18350-18650)
Locking Mechanism
Silver coated positive and negative pins
Floating center pin
510 connection
Surface Stability
Individually serial numbered

name: GMS Mod by VCreations
description:
MS Mechanical Mod by V-Creations (Philippines)

Constructed from 304 Stainless Steel with brass top cap, the GMS is a great looking, well built and hard hitting Philippine made mechanical mod from a newcomer to the modding scene V-Creations.

Now comes with both Stainless Steel and Brass Bottom Cap. You can now customize the look of your GMS. (Please note: this will require you to disassemble and reassemble the bottom cap and firing pin.) 

Features include:
304 Stainless steel body
Telescopic Body to accomodate all 18000 series batteries.
Brass top cap with deep drip well
Brass firing button
Pure silver pins (+,-)
Floating positive pin
Recessed firing button (No lock ring)
